Class FlightBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.FlightBookingSystem
public class FlightBookingSystem extends Object
Manages the operations of the flight booking system, including managing flights, customers, meals, and bookings.

    • getFlights

      public List<Flight> getFlights()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of active (not deleted and not departed) flights.
      Returns:
      A list of active flights.

    • getAllFlights

      public List<Flight> getAllFlights()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all flights, including deleted and departed ones.
      Returns:
      A list of all flights.

    • getCustomers

      public List<Customer> getCustomers()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of active (not deleted) customers.
      Returns:
      A list of active customers.

    • getAllCustomers

      public List<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all customers, including deleted ones.
      Returns:
      A list of all customers.

    • getMeals

      public List<Meal> getMeals()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of active (not deleted) meals.
      Returns:
      A list of active meals.

    • getAllMeals

      public List<Meal> getAllMeals()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all meals, including deleted ones.
      Returns:
      A list of all meals.

    • getMealsFilteredByPreference

      public List<Meal> getMealsFilteredByPreference(MealType preferredType)
      Returns a list of active meals filtered by a preferred meal type. If the preferred type is MealType.NONE, all active meals are returned.
      Parameters:
      preferredType - The preferred meal type to filter by.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of meals matching the preference, or all active meals if preference is NONE.

    • getFlightByID

      public Flight getFlightByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Retrieves an active flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the flight to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Flight object.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If no active flight with the given ID exists or it has departed.

    • getFlightByIDIncludingDeleted

      public Flight getFlightByIDIncludingDeleted(int id)
      Retrieves a flight by its ID, including those marked as deleted.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the flight to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Flight object, or null if not found.

    • getCustomerByID

      public Customer getCustomerByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Retrieves an active customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Customer object.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If no active customer with the given ID exists.

    • getCustomerByIDIncludingDeleted

      public Customer getCustomerByIDIncludingDeleted(int id)
      Retrieves a customer by their ID, including those marked as deleted.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Customer object, or null if not found.

    • getMealByID

      public Meal getMealByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Retrieves an active meal by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the meal to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Meal object.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If no active meal with the given ID exists.

    • getMealByIDIncludingDeleted

      public Meal getMealByIDIncludingDeleted(int id)
      Retrieves a meal by its ID, including those marked as deleted.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the meal to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Meal object, or null if not found.

    • addFlight

      public void addFlight(Flight flight) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a new flight to the system.
      Parameters:
      flight - The Flight object to add.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If a flight with the same flight number and departure date already exists.
      IllegalArgumentException - If a flight with a duplicate ID already exists.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the system or updates an existing one if the ID already exists.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object to add.

    • addMeal

      public void addMeal(Meal meal) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a new meal to the system.
      Parameters:
      meal - The Meal object to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a meal with a duplicate ID already exists.
      FlightBookingSystemException

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Customer customer, Flight outbound, Flight returnFlight, CommercialClassType bookedClass, Meal selectedMeal) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a new booking to the system for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer making the booking.
      outbound - The outbound flight for the booking.
      returnFlight - The return flight for the booking (can be null for one-way).
      bookedClass - The commercial class type for the booking.
      selectedMeal - The selected meal for the booking.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If any flight is at full capacity or the chosen class is not available.

    • addBookingWithoutFlightUpdate

      public void addBookingWithoutFlightUpdate(Booking booking)
      ADDED: A method to add a booking without re-adding passengers. This is primarily for use during data loading where passenger counts are already managed.
      Parameters:
      booking - The Booking object to add.

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(Customer customer, Flight flight) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Cancels a booking for a specific customer and flight. A cancellation fee is calculated and applied.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer whose booking is to be cancelled.
      flight - The flight associated with the booking to be cancelled.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If the customer does not have a booking for the specified flight, or it's already cancelled.

    • calculateCancellationFee

      public BigDecimal calculateCancellationFee(Booking booking)
      Calculates the cancellation fee for a given booking. The fee is 10% of the total booked price (flights + meal), with a minimum of £20.00.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking for which to calculate the cancellation fee.
      Returns:
      The calculated cancellation fee, rounded to two decimal places.

    • calculateRebookFee

      public BigDecimal calculateRebookFee(Booking booking, Flight newFlight, CommercialClassType newClass)
      Calculates the rebooking fee for a booking. Currently, this is a fixed fee of £30.00.
      Parameters:
      booking - The original booking.
      newFlight - The new flight for rebooking.
      newClass - The new commercial class for rebooking.
      Returns:
      The rebooking fee, rounded to two decimal places.

    • removeFlightById

      public boolean removeFlightById(int flightId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes a flight from the system by marking it as deleted.
      Parameters:
      flightId - The ID of the flight to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the flight was found and marked as deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If an error occurs during removal (though currently, no specific exceptions are thrown by this method).

    • removeCustomerById

      public boolean removeCustomerById(int customerId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes a customer from the system by marking them as deleted.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was found and marked as deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If an error occurs during removal (though currently, no specific exceptions are thrown by this method).

    • removeMealById

      public boolean removeMealById(int mealId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes a meal from the system by marking it as deleted.
      Parameters:
      mealId - The ID of the meal to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the meal was found and marked as deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If an error occurs during removal (though currently, no specific exceptions are thrown by this method).

    • editBooking

      public void editBooking(Customer customer, Flight flightInBooking, LocalDate newBookingDate, CommercialClassType newClass) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException

    • getBookings

      public List<Booking> getBookings()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all bookings.

    • getBookingByID

      public Booking getBookingByID(int id)
      Returns a booking by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the booking to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Booking object, or null if not found.
